column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column3: This  property  indicates  the  ON/OFF status.
This property indicates whether the door/cover is open or closed.

column4: Start/restart the washing cycle (started/restarted) = 0x41 Suspend the washing cycle (suspended) = 0x42 Stop the washing cycle (stopped) = 0x43

column3: This property indicates the current stage of the washing cycle.
column4: Washing = 0x41, rinsing = 0x42, spin drying = 0x43, suspended = 0x44, washing cycle stopped/completed = 0x45

column2: Time remaining to complete washing cycle
column3: This property indicates the time remaining to complete the current washing cycle in the HH:MM:SS format.
